Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: As the second-largest city in metropolitan Phoenix, Mesa is larger in population than Miami, Atlanta or Minneapolis. Boeing employs over 4,000 in Mesa, and Apple opened a $2B global command center there in 2018.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Mesa Grandview Business Park offers innovative industrial and flex-office project design with modern architecture and site features expected by the most discriminating companies.
